CustomField.formula: IF(Location.GDMFSL_Is_Classified__c = FALSE, (Location.GDMFSL_Address__r.Street & BR() & Location.GDMFSL_Address__r.City & ", " & TEXT(Location.GDMFSL_Address__r.StateCode) & " " & BR() & Location.GDMFSL_Address__r.PostalCode), "Undisclosed Location")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field populated based on Location and displayed as undisclosed for classified locations
CustomField.label: Location Address
